page.title: 10A SCHOOL CHILDS WEEKEND
page.content: IN COMPLETE CONTRAST TO A WEEK DAY,WE GET UP AT VARIOUS TIMES LATER THAN USUAL.MY SISTER NICKY, MY BROTHER ROSS AND I HAVE CEREAL FOR BREAKFAST. MUM HAS MUESLI BUT DAD DOESN'T HAVE ANYTHING. I HAD A QUICK GAME OF SNOOKER AGAINST ROSS UNTIL IT WAS TIME TO DO THE BREAKFAST THINGS. ROSS WENT OUT TO PLAY WHILE THE REST OF US PREARED DINNER. I ONLY HAD TO PEAL THE POTATOES. ON SUNDAY I GOT DRESSED AND WENT DOWN STAIRS,I HAD TWO SHREDDED WHEAT AND DRINK FOR BREAKFAST.AT 2.00 IT'S DINNER TIME WE HAD LAMB,POTATOES, PEAS,AND CABBAGE.ON MONDAY THE MAIN EVENT WAS THE ROUND TABLES DONKEY DERBY.THE FIRST THING I DID WAS WATCH THE FIRST RACE .RICHARD APPEARED FOR OUR SCHOOL ON DONKEY NUMBER 1.I CAME HOME WITH WAS A PACK OF CARDS.I DIDN'T FEEL WELL SO I CAME HOME EARLY.
